sections.markdown:
# Third-party vulnerabilities exposure report

List and analyze organizational exposure to a threat consisting of multiple third-party vulnerabilities.

#### Use this template to answer the following security questions:

* What are the top vulnerabilities and their recent change events?
* Where the vulnerabilities are? 
* Which teams are responsible for fixing the vulnerabilities?

#### Applied threat filter:
`contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,"apache")`

*Note: Each widget is pre-filtered with the threat filter context. Press **Rerun sections** to refresh all the widgets at once.*

## ðŸ’¥ Exposure summary 
--- 
Your environment's exposure to vulnerabilities, the affected or related entities, and trends.

input.value:
fetch events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,"apache") // filter for explicit component
// filter for the latest snapshot per entity
| fieldsAdd matcher="match"
| lookup [
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "VULNERABILITY_MANAGEMENT" 
| filter event.provider == "Dynatrace" 
| filter event.type == "VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" 
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"  
| filter contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,"apache") // filter for explicit component
| fields 
maxTimestamp=timestamp,
matcher="match"
| limit 1
], sourceField:matcher, lookupField:matcher, fields:{maxTimestamp}
| filter timestamp==maxTimestamp
// end of filter for the latest snapshot
| summarize
{
`# Non-muted entities`=countIf(vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED"),
`Mute status`=takeFirst(vulnerability.parent.mute.status),
`Last mute status`=takeMax(toTimestamp(vulnerability.parent.mute.change_date)),
`Last entity mute status`=takeMax(toTimestamp(vulnerability.mute.change_date)),
`# Afftected entities`=countIf(vulnerability.resolution.status=="OPEN"),
`Resolution status`=takeFirst(vulnerability.parent.resolution.status),
`Last status`=takeMax(toTimestamp(vulnerability.parent.resolution.change_date)),
`Last entity status`=takeMax(toTimestamp(vulnerability.resolution.change_date)),
`max Davis Security Score`=round(takeMax(vulnerability.risk.score),decimals:1),
`First seen`=takeMin(toTimestamp(vulnerability.first_seen)),
`Last seen`=takeMax(timestamp)
}, by: {vulnerability.display_id}
| summarize 
{
Total=count(),
Muted=countIf(`# Non-muted entities`==0 OR `Mute status`=="MUTED"),
Open=countIf(`# Afftected entities`>0 AND `# Non-muted entities`>0 AND `Mute status`=="NOT_MUTED"),
Resolved=countIf(`# Afftected entities`==0 OR `Resolution status`=="RESOLVED"),
`Last seen`=takeMax(`Last seen`),
`First seen`=takeMin(`First seen`),
`Last status`=takeMax(`Last status`),
`Last entity status`=takeMax(`Last entity status`),
`Last mute status`=takeMax(`Last mute status`),
`Last entity mute status`=takeMax(`Last entity mute status`)
}
| fields 
Total,
Open=concat("ðŸ”´ ",Open),
Muted=concat("âš« ",Muted),
Resolved=concat("âœ… ",Resolved),
`Status change`=if(arrayMax(array(`Last entity status`,`Last status`,`Last mute status`,`Last entity mute status`)) > now()-1d,arrayMax(array(`Last entity status`,`Last status`,`Last mute status`,`Last entity mute status`)),
                else:concat(toLong((now()-arrayMax(array(`Last entity status`,`Last status`,`Last mute status`,`Last entity mute status`)))/1d)," days ago")),
`First seen`=concat(toLong((now()-`First seen`)/1d)," days ago"),
`Last seen`=concat(toLong((now()-`Last seen`)/1m)," minutes ago")

grail.canonicalQuery:
fetch events
| filter event.provider == "Dynatrace"
| filter event.type == "VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level == "ENTITY"
| filter contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name, "apache")
| fieldsAdd "match", alias:matcher
| lookup 
	[
		fetch events
		| filter event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
		| filter event.category == "VULNERABILITY_MANAGEMENT"
		| filter event.provider == "Dynatrace"
		| filter event.type == "VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
		| filter event.level == "ENTITY"
		| filter contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name, "apache")
		| fields {timestamp, alias:maxTimestamp}, {"match", alias:matcher}
		| limit 1
	], sourceField:matcher, lookupField:matcher, fields:{maxTimestamp}
| filter timestamp == maxTimestamp
| summarize by:{vulnerability.display_id}, {{countIf(vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED"), alias:`# Non-muted entities`}, {takeFirst(vulnerability.parent.mute.status), alias:`Mute status`}, {takeMax(toTimestamp(vulnerability.parent.mute.change_date)), alias:`Last mute status`}, {takeMax(toTimestamp(vulnerability.mute.change_date)), alias:`Last entity mute status`}, {countIf(vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"), alias:`# Afftected entities`}, {takeFirst(vulnerability.parent.resolution.status), alias:`Resolution status`}, {takeMax(toTimestamp(vulnerability.parent.resolution.change_date)), alias:`Last status`}, {takeMax(toTimestamp(vulnerability.resolution.change_date)), alias:`Last entity status`}, {round(takeMax(vulnerability.risk.score), decimals:1), alias:`max Davis Security Score`}, {takeMin(toTimestamp(vulnerability.first_seen)), alias:`First seen`}, {takeMax(timestamp), alias:`Last seen`}}
| summarize {count(), alias:Total}, {countIf(`# Non-muted entities` == 0 OR `Mute status` == "MUTED"), alias:Muted}, {countIf(`# Afftected entities` > 0 AND `# Non-muted entities` > 0 AND `Mute status` == "NOT_MUTED"), alias:Open}, {countIf(`# Afftected entities` == 0 OR `Resolution status` == "RESOLVED"), alias:Resolved}, {takeMax(`Last seen`), alias:`Last seen`}, {takeMin(`First seen`), alias:`First seen`}, {takeMax(`Last status`), alias:`Last status`}, {takeMax(`Last entity status`), alias:`Last entity status`}, {takeMax(`Last mute status`), alias:`Last mute status`}, {takeMax(`Last entity mute status`), alias:`Last entity mute status`}
| fields Total, {concat("ðŸ”´ ", Open), alias:Open}, {concat("âš« ", Muted), alias:Muted}, {concat("âœ… ", Resolved), alias:Resolved}, {if(arrayMax(array(`Last entity status`, `Last status`, `Last mute status`, `Last entity mute status`)) > now() - 1d, arrayMax(array(`Last entity status`, `Last status`, `Last mute status`, `Last entity mute status`)), else:concat(toLong((now() - arrayMax(array(`Last entity status`, `Last status`, `Last mute status`, `Last entity mute status`))) / 1d), " days ago")), alias:`Status change`}, {concat(toLong((now() - `First seen`) / 1d), " days ago"), alias:`First seen`}, {concat(toLong((now() - `Last seen`) / 1m), " minutes ago"), alias:`Last seen`}

input.value:
fetch events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter vulnerability.resolution.status=="OPEN"
| filter contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,"apache") // filter for explicit component
| summarize Vulnerabilities=countDistinct(vulnerability.display_id), by:{timestamp}
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| summarize Vulnerabilities=takeFirst(Vulnerabilities), by:{timestamp=bin(timestamp,1h)}
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"

sections.title: Davis assessment summary for affected entities

input.value:
fetch events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"               
| filter contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,"apache") // filter for explicit component
// filter for the latest snapshot per entity
| fieldsAdd matcher="match"
| lookup [
fetch events
| filter event.provider == "Dynatrace" 
| filter event.type == "VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" 
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"  
| filter contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,"apache") // filter for explicit component
| fields 
maxTimestamp=timestamp,
matcher="match"
| limit 1
], sourceField:matcher, lookupField:matcher, fields:{maxTimestamp}
| filter timestamp==maxTimestamp
// end of filter for the latest snapshot
| summarize
{
`Function in use`=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status=="IN_USE"),
`Function not in use`=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status=="NOT_IN_USE"),
`Function not available`=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status=="NOT_AVAILABLE"),
`Internet exposure`=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exposure_status=="PUBLIC_NETWORK"),
`Data assets in reach`=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.data_assets_status),
Type=takeAny(affected_entity.type)
}, by: {affected_entity.id}
| summarize 
{
`Function in use`=countIf(`Function in use`>0),
`Function not in use`=countIf(`Function not in use`>0),
`Function not available`=countIf(`Function not available`>0),
`Internet exposure`=countIf(`Internet exposure`>0),
`Data assets in reach`=countIf(`Data assets in reach`>0),
`Affected entities`=arraySize(collectDistinct(affected_entity.id)),
Types=collectDistinct(Type)
}
| fields
Types,
`Affected entities`,
`With internet exposure`=if(`Internet exposure`>0,concat("â—",`Internet exposure`),else:0),
`With data assets in reach`=if(`Data assets in reach`>0,concat("â—",`Data assets in reach`),else:0),
`With function in use`=if(`Function in use`>0,concat("â—",`Function in use`),else:if(`Function not in use`>0,"Not in use",else:"No data"))

sections.markdown:
## ðŸ” Vulnerability details
--- 
Priority list of vulnerabilities and their recent change events.

sections.title: List of open vulnerabilities by criticality and affected entities count

input.value:
fetch events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter vulnerability.resolution.status=="OPEN"
| filter contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,"apache") // filter for explicit component
// filter only the latest snapshot data
| fieldsAdd matcher="match"
| lookup [
fetch events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter vulnerability.resolution.status=="OPEN"
| filter contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,"apache") // filter for explicit component
| fields 
maxTimestamp=timestamp,
matcher="match"
| limit 1
], sourceField:matcher, lookupField:matcher, fields:{maxTimestamp}
| filter timestamp==maxTimestamp
//end of filtering for the latest snapshot
// now summarize on the vulnerability level
| summarize
{
`Last status`=takeFirst(vulnerability.resolution.change_date),
`Muted`=takeFirst(vulnerability.mute.status=="MUTED"),
`# Affected entities`=arraySize(collectDistinct(affected_entity.id)),
`Status`=takeFirst(vulnerability.resolution.status),
`Component name`=takeFirst(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name),
`DSS`=round(takeFirst(vulnerability.risk.score),decimals:1),
`Davis Security Level`=takeFirst(vulnerability.risk.level),
`Problem title`=takeFirst(vulnerability.title),
`External id`=takeFirst(vulnerability.external_id),
`Technology`=takeFirst(vulnerability.technology),
`CVE list`=takeFirst(vulnerability.references.cve),
Title=takeFirst(vulnerability.title),
`# Function in use`=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status=="IN_USE"),
`# Function no data`=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status=="NOT_AVAILABLE"),
`# Exposure to internet`=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exposure_status=="PUBLIC_NETWORK"),
`# Exposure no data`=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exposure_status=="NOT_AVAILABLE"),
`# Reachable databases`=takeFirst(related_entities.databases.count),
`# Exploit`=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exploit_status=="AVAILABLE")
}, by: {vulnerability.display_id}
| fieldsAdd risk_order=if(`Davis Security Level`=="CRITICAL",1, else:if(`Davis Security Level`=="HIGH",2,  else:if(`Davis Security Level`=="MEDIUM",3 ,else:if(`Davis Security Level`=="LOW",4))))
| fields 
risk_order,
`Davis Security Score`=concat(`Davis Security Level`," (",`DSS`,")"),
DSS,
vulnerability.display_id,
Title,
`CVE list`,
Status=if(Status=="RESOLVED",concat("âœ…","Resolved"),else:if(Muted, concat("âš«"," Muted(",Status,")"), else:Status)),
`Status date`=toTimestamp(`Last status`),
`# Function in use`,
`Function usage`=if(`# Function in use`>0,concat("â—","In use"),else:if(`# Function no data`>0,"No data",else:"Not in use")),
`# Exposure to internet`,
`Internet exposure`=if(`# Exposure to internet`>0,concat("â—","Public"),else:if(`# Exposure no data`>0,"No data",else:"Not exposed")),
`# Exploit`,
`Exploit`=if(`# Exploit`>0,concat("â—","Exists"),else:"No data"),
`# Reachable databases`,
`Data assets`=if(`# Reachable databases`>0,concat("â—","Reachable"), else:"Unreachable"),
`Affected entities`=`# Affected entities`,
`External id`
| sort   Status,  risk_order, {`# Function in use`, direction:"descending"}, {`# Exposure to internet`, direction:"descending"}, 
{`# Exploit`, direction:"descending"}, {`# Reachable databases`, direction:"descending"}, {`Affected entities`, direction:"descending"}, 
{DSS, direction:"descending"}
| fieldsRemove DSS, risk_order, `# Function in use`,`# Reachable databases`,`# Exposure to internet`,`# Exploit`

sections.markdown:
## ðŸŽ¯ Environment analysis
--- 
In-depth examination of your environment in the context of the selected vulnerability; includes a list of the most affected entities and the responsible teams.

### Affected entities

Those are directly affected entities where vulnerabilities were discovered.

grail.canonicalQuery:
fetch events
| filter event.provider == "Dynatrace"
| filter event.type == "VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level == "ENTITY"
| filter vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
| filter contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name, "apache")
| fieldsAdd "match", alias:matcher
| lookup 
	[
		fetch events
		| filter event.provider == "Dynatrace"
		| filter event.type == "VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
		| filter event.level == "ENTITY"
		| filter vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
		| filter contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name, "apache")
		| fields {timestamp, alias:maxTimestamp}, {"match", alias:matcher}
		| limit 1
	], sourceField:matcher, lookupField:matcher, fields:{maxTimestamp}
| filter timestamp == maxTimestamp
| lookup 
	[
		fetch dt.entity.process_group
		| fieldsAdd tags
	], sourceField:dt.entity.process_group, lookupField:id, fields:{tags}
| parse toString(tags), "LD ('owner:'|'owner\\\\:') (SPACE)? LD:Team ('\"')"
| fieldsAdd if(isNotNull(Team), Team, else:"-"), alias:Team
| fieldsRemove lookup.id, lookup.entity.name, Tags
| summarize by:{Team}, {{collectDistinct(affected_entity.name), alias:`Entity names`}, {arrayRemoveNulls(collectDistinct(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name)), alias:`Component names`}}
| fields Team, {arraySize(`Entity names`), alias:`Affected entities`}, {arraySize(`Component names`), alias:Components}
| sort {`Affected entities`, direction:"descending"}, {Components, direction:"descending"}

| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"

| filter event.level=="ENTITY"

// filter only the latest snapshot data
| fieldsAdd matcher="match"
| lookup [
fetch events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"

| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter vulnerability.resolution.status=="OPEN"
| filter contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,"apache") // filter for explicit component
| fields 
maxTimestamp=timestamp,
matcher="match"
| limit 1
], sourceField:matcher, lookupField:matcher, fields:{maxTimestamp}
| filter timestamp==maxTimestamp
//end of filtering for the latest snapshot
//add ownership information
| lookup [
fetch dt.entity.process_group
| fieldsAdd tags
], sourceField:dt.entity.process_group, lookupField:id, fields:{tags}
| parse toString(tags), "LD ('owner:'|'owner\\\\:') (SPACE)? LD:Team ('\"')"
| fieldsRemove lookup.id, lookup.entity.name, Tags
// end of adding ownership info
// summarize on component level
| summarize
{
`# Affected entities`=arraySize(collectDistinct(affected_entity.id)),
`Component name`=takeFirst(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name),
`Functions`=arrayRemoveNulls(collectDistinct(affected_entity.vulnerable_functions)),
`# Function usages`=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status == "IN_USE"),
`# Function not in use`=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status == "NOT_IN_USE"),
Teams=collectDistinct(Team)
},by: {affected_entity.vulnerable_component.id, alias:`Component id`}
| filterOut isNull(`Component id`)
//add component information
| lookup [
fetch dt.entity.software_component
| fieldsAdd softwareComponentFileName
], sourceField:`Component id`, lookupField:id
| fieldsRename File=lookup.softwareComponentFileName
| fieldsRemove lookup.id, lookup.entity.name
// end of adding ownership info
| fields
dt.entity.software_component=`Component id`,
`Component name`,
File=if(isNotNull(File),File,else:"-"),
`Vulnerable function`=if(arraySize(Functions)>0,Functions,else:"-"),
`Entities with function in use`=if(`# Function usages`>0,`# Function usages`,else:if(`# Function not in use`>0,"Not in use",else:"No data")),
Teams=if(arraySize(arrayRemoveNulls(Teams))>0,arrayRemoveNulls(Teams),else:"-")
| sort {`Entities with function in use`, direction:"descending"}

| fieldsRename File=lookup.softwareComponentFileName

sections.markdown:
### Related entities

Those are indirect entities with a direct connection to one of the affected entities.

input.value:
fetch events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter contains(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name,"apache") // filter for explicit component
//filter for the latest snapshot
| fieldsAdd matcher="match"
| lookup [
fetch events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| fields 
maxTimestamp=timestamp,
matcher="match"
| limit 1
], sourceField:matcher, lookupField:matcher, fields:{maxTimestamp}
| filter timestamp==maxTimestamp
// end of filter for the latest snapshot
| filter related_entities.hosts.count>0
| expand entity_id=related_entities.hosts.ids
| summarize count(), by: {entity_id}
//add ownership information
| lookup [
fetch dt.entity.host
| fieldsAdd tags, process_groups=arraySize(runs[dt.entity.process_group])
], sourceField:entity_id, lookupField:id
| fieldsRename Tags=lookup.tags, `Running process groups`=lookup.process_groups
| parse toString(Tags), "LD ('owner:'|'owner\\\\:') (SPACE)? LD:Team ('\"')"
| fields 
dt.entity.host=entity_id, 
`Host name`=lookup.entity.name, 
Team=if(isNotNull(Team),Team,else:"-"), 
`Running process groups`=if(`Running process groups`>=100,">100",else:coalesce(toLong(`Running process groups`), 0))
| sort `Running process groups`, direction:"descending"
